title: Filling Multiple 96 Well Plates
author: Opentrons
description: With this protocol, your robot will be able to fill 5 96-well plates with a reagent in a 1-well reagent reservoir using 2 P300 multi-channel pipettes. User can define the volume to be transferred into each well.
process:
Input your desired volume.
Download your protocol.
Upload your protocol into the OT App.
Set up your deck according to the deck map.
Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our support article.
Hit "Run".
Pipette 1 will aspirate reagent.
Pipette 2 will aspirate reagent.
Pipette 1 will dispense reagent into column 1 in plate 1.
Pipette 2 will dispense reagent into column 2 in plate 1.
Robot will repeat steps 7-10 until the desired volume of solution has been transferred. Pipettes will drop tips.
Robot will Repeat steps 7-11 until all columns of all 5 plates have been filled.

markdown.title: Filling Multiple 96 Well Plates
markdown.author: [Opentrons](http://www.opentrons.com/)
markdown.description: With this protocol, your robot will be able to fill 5 96-well plates with a reagent in a 1-well reagent reservoir using 2 P300 multi-channel pipettes. User can define the volume to be transferred into each well.
markdown.process:
1. Input your desired volume.
2. Download your protocol.
3. Upload your protocol into the [OT App](https://opentrons.com/ot-app).
4. Set up your deck according to the deck map.
5. Calibrate your labware, tiprack and pipette using the OT App. For calibration tips, check out our [support article](https://support.opentrons.com/ot-2/getting-started-software-setup/deck-calibration).
6. Hit "Run".
7. Pipette 1 will aspirate reagent.
8. Pipette 2 will aspirate reagent.
9. Pipette 1 will dispense reagent into column 1 in plate 1.
10. Pipette 2 will dispense reagent into column 2 in plate 1.
11. Robot will repeat steps 7-10 until the desired volume of solution has been transferred. Pipettes will drop tips.
12. Robot will Repeat steps 7-11 until all columns of all 5 plates have been filled.
